Articles.Content:
Im not a karate man, nor do i agree to BadS = true... unless youre valentina... then you can be BadS.

(please tell me youre valentina)

TUBM likes to make ksp fanficition.

I have not done karate, but I have been ninja'd!

The user below me has a "career"

EDIT: Such Ninja

Edited August 6, 2015 by FireFaced

Not yet, but working on it.

TUBM likes cheese

Good ol' Romano.

You say you're more of a Parmesan guy yourself?

Depends on the cheese.....

The user below me has read a book in the last three months.

Correct

The user below me is human

Yep.

TUBM is a BadS

I'm a wimp.

The user below is canadian, eh?

Join the club, eh

TUBM uses Twitter

What twitter?

The user below me has watched Red VS Blue

(If you have, respond with a quote from RvB)

I unfortunately do, but mostly for Paradox interactive news.

TUBM doesnt use internet for anything else than ksp forums.

What kind of question is that? I use the internet for everything except for KSP

TUBM has never left their birth country

I even live in another country than my birth country.

The user below me can name three astronauts from the top of his head.

This is impossible for me to respond to.

Can you solve that paradox?

There's no such thing as a word paradox. Only ones are the ones people believe them to be, but arent in fact.

TUBM believes that too.

This is not an infinite regression paradox. If you read the previous sentence, it is. Both sentences are true.

You had to read that twice, didn't you?

What do you mean exactly? If youre saying its impossible for you to respond to, but youre still responding, then youre simply lying. I dont quite understand your way of thinking.

TUBM doesnt either.

Edit: Yes, i had to read that twice...

Does not compute.

The user below me can name a real astronaut that is not Neil Armstrong or Buzz Aldrin.

True! My family is friends with astronaut Joe Engle...second man to fly the space shuttle Columbia!

The person below me has a terrible internet connection...most of the time.

Correct... It is abysmal

The person below me has not landed on Dres.
Yep, the person below me has met a real astronaut.

Yep Jim something or other. My dad did some landscaping for him when I was 6, I have a signed photo and everything

The person below me has watched a rocket launch on TV.

Yes, I can remember watching some of the early Shuttle launches on TV as a boy.

The user below me has watched a rocket launch live (either in person or via a stream) this year.

SMAP, DSCOVR, Ariane 5 Directv/Skymexico, MMS, Sentinel 2A, CRS-7, so yes, you are correct!

The person below me reads the Hitchikers guide to the galaxy.

Edited August 9, 2015 by SaturnianBlue

I used to. I need to start that again...

I bet you thought it was awesome.
